doc.after: Civilian pilots fly aircraft of all types privately for pleasure charity or in pursuance of a business and or commercially for non scheduled charter and scheduled passenger and cargo air carriers airlines corporate aviation agriculture crop dusting etc forest fire control law enforcement etc When flying for an airline pilots are usually referred to as airline pilots with the pilot in command often referred to as the captain
